Reviews.Title: The worst phone i have ever had
Reviews.Author: Tom petty "J" "jj"
Reviews.Content: I bought this product from boost mobile and have had more problems with it than i have ever had with any phone. Just 3 months old with no damage The texting at times takes minutes to receive or send a message.(a stupid hourglass downloading screen comes up) The texts and phone presets words have scrambled(????) among numerous other issues. I do not recomend this phone at alll.

Reviews.Title: Never again
Reviews.Author: Kita
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone from boost. I am on amazon looking for a different phone. This is THE WORST phone I have ever owned. You cannot do anything with pictures. You can't find the menu. You can't change the backround from preset pics. You cannot delete your sent or recieved text messages. Entering your contacts is a nightmare. I would NEVER recommend the purchase of this phone to anyone. At $75 its a rip off. This is a $10 throw away phone.

Reviews.Title: Outdated phone, DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: This phone is horrible, I've had it for about a year, and it was horrible from day one! First off, the phone itself is awkwardly shaped, it feels weird in ur hands... the button placement sucks, the camera cant take a picture of anything with clarity... basically, if you reached into your junk drawer and grabbed a phone fron 1995 out of it, that phone has more features, is more reliable, and prolly has a better camera. On average about 1/5 of my voice calls went through even when I had perfect service.. Text messages would send 2-3 days after you tried to send them.. people texting you might get a text after 8hrs or 2 days, which obliterates the idea of text messaging.. Honestly the phone sucks, theres no other way to put it, DO NOT PURCHASE THIS PHONe

Reviews.Title: No longer supported...
Reviews.Author: D. Smith "hounddog80014"
Reviews.Content: Per their website, Boost Mobile no longer supports new activations of iDen series phones such as this one. Thus, it goes without saying, that there is absolutely no reason to buy this phone.

Reviews.Title: Great for now
Reviews.Author: koalak1
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, works wellI found out after I bought it that Boost will no long be servicing these phones after July 2013

Reviews.Title: Worst Phone on the Planet!!
Reviews.Author: Charles Entress
Reviews.Content: If you buy this phone you deserve to lose your money on a product that does not access the internet, drops calls regularly, and has many dead areas causing lack of reception.  The price on this phone is outrageous; maybe it's worth no more than five dollars for a two-year old who likes to play telephone, but not any more than that.It's eye openning that Amazon would even carry this dinosaur on its product list.I feel ripped off even spending time writing about how bad this phone is.

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: smky78
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone and returned it within a few days.  It constantly dropped calls, battery wouldn't stay charged more than a few short hours, texts took forever to send and receive, sporadically, like sometimes it would send right away, sometimes it took a day or two.  No thanks.  I would not recommend this phone to anyone.  Even if you just talk and don't text, it literally hung up on everybody I talked to.  I would take it off the charger, go to work for 5 hours, and the battery would be dead or almost dead, so I would charge it again and it would be dead by the time I went to bed.  And that is with very minimal use.  Usually it was just sitting there.  I can't imagine how it would do if someone was on it 24/7.

Reviews.Title: dont buy it unless its for a 5 year old
Reviews.Author: Jesus Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: WELL WHEN I FIRST STARTED WITH BOOST MOBILE THIS WAS MY FIRST PHONE AND IT DID ITS JOB I USED IT FOR TEXTING AND I LOVED THE WALKIE TALKIE BUT GOING ONLINE AND ALL THAT SOCIALIZING IS NONE EXISTENT. WITH THE NEW ANDROID AND BLACK BERRY CURVE phones this would be just a waste of money.THIS PHONE IS TRASH I WOULDNT RECOMMEND THIS PHONE TO ANYONE NOW UNLESS ITS FOR LIKE 5-10 YEAR OLD FOR LIKE MESSAGING AND PHONE CALLS BUT OTHER THAN THAT ITS A NO NO. AND YES I HAVE AN ANDROID PHONE WITH BOOST AND IM HAPPY. ONLY GOOD THiNG IS THE FEEL OF THIS PHONE THE LIL KEYBOARD IS KINDA NICE TILL ITS ALL SCRATCHED UP AND MINE WAS THE BLACK GRAPHITE ONE. RIP MY OLD CLUTCH AND OH YEAH AFTER TWO YEARS MY PHONE JUST STOPPED WORKING SO NOT WORTH THE MONEY ANOTHER GOOD PHONE IS THE SANYO INCOGNITO MY MOM HAS THAT ITS WAY BETTER!

Reviews.Title: Phone
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: Only had the phone for what 2 months?  The phone worked fine the first month but the second month we put minutes on the phone and could not use..took the phone into Boost Mobile to have them look at it and they said the inside is of the phone is broke and antenna does not work its broke..so the phone you sold me is junk.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: eduarda orzes
Reviews.Content: came in perfect condition and it works great.the price i paid was worth it.looks like new and it came before the day i was expecting .

Reviews.Title: just fine
Reviews.Author: slow motion
Reviews.Content: I have enjoyed the purchase of this phone for sometime, would say this phone with all it's features will be more than enough for anyone looking.

Reviews.Title: tough as nails
Reviews.Author: michael0810
Reviews.Content: i carry my phone on my side all the time it is exposed to metal shavings, dust water automotive fluids heat and smoke drastic temperature and humidity changes. it gets dropped sat & stepped on even ran over by vehicles. it gets banged off of doorways and tables left laying in the yard all night and day. not to mention the grease where i work. i have never had a non Motorola phone till now all of these have stood up to everything i can dish out.  in the name of faster texting i have traded my i465 for a rant. time to see if a Samsung can take the same abuse.all in all if you want tough phone and don't mind the texting and web being somewhat slow then this is the phone for you

Reviews.Title: PHONE
Reviews.Author: CONFIDENT
Reviews.Content: MY KIDS GOT THIS FOR ME FOR CHRISTMAS, AFTER SEEING HOW OLD MY OTHER PHONE WS. "EVERYTHING THAT i WANTED AND MORE!!!!!!!!!!!!!"

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in digital camera With 4x zoom lets you take still photos and short videos.
Boost Multimedia and text (threaded and unthreaded) messaging
Color display
Built-in Bluetooth compatibility
Customizable polyphonic and voice ringtones
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola Clutch i465 for Boost Mobile- Red
